Title: Needle in a Haystack
Plot: House and his staff must deal with a teenage Gypsy boy suffering from inexplicable respiratory distress. However, House has bigger issues on his mind: Cuddy has given away his handicapped spot.
GuestStars: Jake Richardson, Maxine Hayden, Joni Barth, Tyrace Richardson, Antonio D. Charity, Tasha Taylor, Hira Ambrosino, Sandra Purpuro, David Kelsey, Rob Brownstein, Jessy Schram, Wendy Makkena, Arabella Field
